entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 08:11 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
